sqlMap.select:
select t.user_id, t.user_name, t.org_no, t.dep_code, t.mobile, t.email, t.mobile2, t.status, t.crt_time, t.remark from t_setp_user t where 1=1
and t.mobile='$mobile$'
and t.pwd='$pwd$'
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_setp_logon ( user_id, logdate, result, remark ) values( '$user_id$', sysdate, '$result$', '$remark$' )
insert into t_setp_number ( user_id, setp_num, deal_time, remark1, remark2 ) values( '$user_id$', '$setp_num$', sysdate, '$remark1$', '$remark2$' )
sqlMap.delete: delete from t_setp_number t where t.user_id = '$user_id$' and to_char(t.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')
sqlMap.select:
select b.user_name,/*姓名*/ sum(a.setp_num) setp_num,/*步数*/ rank() over(order by sum(a.setp_num) desc nulls last) rank1,/*分行中排名*/ rank() over(partition by c.p_org_no order by sum(a.setp_num) desc nulls last) rank2/*部门中排名*/ from t_setp_number a,t_setp_user b,t_sys_org_info c where a.user_id=b.user_id and b.org_no=c.org_no
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') = '$stat_date$'/*日*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') between to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'day'),'yyyymmdd') and to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'day')+6,'yyyymmdd')/*周*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymm') = substr('$stat_date$',1,6)/*月*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') between to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'Q'),'yyyymmdd') and to_char(add_months(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'Q'), 3) - 1,'yyyymmdd')/*季*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyy') = substr('$stat_date$',1,4)/*年*/
group by b.user_name, c.p_org_no

select c.org_name,/*部门*/ sum(a.setp_num) setp_num,/*步数*/ rank() over(order by sum(a.setp_num) desc nulls last) rank1/*排名*/ from t_setp_number a,t_setp_user b,t_sys_org_info c where a.user_id=b.user_id and b.org_no=c.org_no
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') = '$stat_date$'/*日*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') between to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'day'),'yyyymmdd') and to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'day')+6,'yyyymmdd')/*周*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymm') = substr('$stat_date$',1,6)/*月*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') between to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'Q'),'yyyymmdd') and to_char(add_months(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'Q'), 3) - 1,'yyyymmdd')/*季*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyy') = substr('$stat_date$',1,4)/*年*/
group by c.p_org_no, c.org_name
